## Importing the library:
```{r setup}
library(lab4Rpackage)
```

## Importing a sample dataset and Creating a linreg object

```{r }
data(iris)
obj <- linreg(formula = Petal.Length~Species, data = iris)
```

## Methods

### Print
```{r }
print(obj)
```

### coef
```{r }
coef(obj)
```

### plot
```{r , message=F, warning=F}
plot(obj)
```

### pred
```{r }
head(pred(obj),10)
```

### resid
```{r }
head(resid(obj))
```

### summary
```{r }
summary(obj)
```
